main event: A strange object resembling a blue ball with a dark blue streak was sighted traveling from North to South-Southwest at an altitude of 4000 feet approximately 17 miles east of Columbus, Ohio on July 1, 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported by the pilot of a TWA aircraft and a member of the Columbus Fire Department., The sighting was registered on July 13, 1956., The object was described as appearing larger than an aircraft., The altitude of the object was estimated to be 4000 feet., The specific details of the sighting were marked as probable observation with insufficient data.
sighted object: a blue ball with a dark blue streak trailing
witness description: pilot of a TWA aircraft and a member of the Columbus Fire Department
